content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Hello Baihu Li,

Thank you for coming to see the apartment. As the landlord, I am looking to maximize my rental income. I understand that you are interested in the property and I am open to negotiating a rental price that is fair to both of us.

What is your budget for renting the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can we agree on a rental price?

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I want to be responsible and dependable. I want to pay the rent on time and not have any issues with the landlord.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Hello Baihu Li,

As a landlord, I appreciate your willingness to be a responsible tenant and pay rent on time. However, I am also looking to maximize my rental income.

Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am proposing a rental price of €500 per month. This is the lowest possible price I am willing to accept for this property.

I hope we can agree on this rental price. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €500 per month.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

I will pay the rent on time and be responsible for any damages caused by me or my roommates.

I appreciate your willingness to work with me and I look forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Hello Baihu Li,

I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of €500 per month. As the landlord, I appreciate your willingness to be a responsible tenant and pay rent on time.

I will provide you with a lease agreement that outlines the terms and conditions of the rental agreement. Please review it carefully and let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Once you have signed the lease agreement, you can move into the apartment. I look forward to having you as a tenant and wish you all the best in your studies.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
